medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
title: Landscape Sketches by Ike Taiga
marks: Chinese poems on each page Shinsuitei Tenju utsusu
description: blue cover; sewn binding; single text page with three characters followed by 12 reproduction drawings, most of which fill two pages each, one covers four pages ending with six pages of text
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
